    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static BasemapLayer.Options create()

      • setBandIds

        public final void setBandIds(int[] bandIds)
        Parameters:
        bandIds - - Optional. If the url points to an image service, you can specify which band ids will display. If not set, the first three available band ids will display.

      • setDisplayLevels

        public final void setDisplayLevels(int[] displayLevels)
        Parameters:
        displayLevels - - Optional. If the url points to a cached map service you can specify the levels to draw. If not set, all display levels the service supports are drawn.

      • isReference

        public final void isReference(boolean isReference)
        Parameters:
        isReference - - Optional. Set to true if the layer is a reference layer and should be drawn on top of all other layers in the map.

      • setOpacity

        public final void setOpacity(double opacity)
        Set the opacity
        Parameters:
        opacity - - Initial opacity or transparency of the basemap layer. Values range from 0.0 to 1.0 where 0.0 is 100% transparent and 1.0 has no transprency. The default value is 1.0.

      • setType

        public final void setType(java.lang.String type)
        Parameters:
        type - - The type of layer, valid values are "BingMapsAerial", "BingMapsHybrid", "BingMapsRoad", "OpenStreetMap". Must specify either the url or type parameter.

      • setUrl

        public final void setUrl(java.lang.String url)
        Parameters:
        url - - URL to the ArcGIS Server REST resource that represents a map or image service. Must specify either the url or type parameter.

      • setVisibleLayers

        public final void setVisibleLayers(int[] visibleLayers)
        Parameters:
        visibleLayers - - Optional. If the url points to a dynamic map service you can specify a subset of layers to display. If not set, all visible layers are displayed.
